Welcome

I am a Senior Economist at the Center for Excellence in Finance and Economic Research (CEFER) of the Bank of Lithuania and Research Fellow at the Faculty of Economics and Business Administration of Vilnius University.

I recently completed my PhD at University College London (UCL). My research is in macroeconomics with a focus on firm dynamics and corporate finance.
